title: Gothic Sex - Divided We Fall (1994)
description:
Gothic Gothic is a metal band from ( Zaragoza , Spain ) ,founded in 1988.

On stage are theatrical scenes Bondage and Sado Masochism. The group, which included former members of Notre Dame and Cadaveres Aterciopelados, one year after its formation debuted with the single "El Frenzy" in 1989.

This was followed in 1992 by a conceptual video that included footage by alive. The album "ritualistic Mortis" album would be shared with another Spanish act "Los Humillados".

"Ritualistic Mortis" saw the band with a line up of gothic Lord on vocals and guitar, like Lady gothic vocalist and drummer and keyboardist as Madame Morgue.

In the accompanying album "Divided We Fall" bassist Averno and GOTHIC SEX had been introduced acting as Umbra Et Imago support of Germany's tour of BÃƒÂ©lgica.

A band titled to 'Death Tour " , which for years would cause strong response from mass media , by doing scenes GOTHIC SEX flogging , bondage and sadomasochism onstage.
Indignation does not end there as the stages would be flooded with true Blood, guts and heads of animals.

Following the album "Moonrise" 1996 GOTHIC SEX left to tour with (Lord and Lady Gothic) aided by guitarist (Metal Storm) and bassist (Dr. Van Hellsing).

Tour to promote this album 1997 'Laments', Lord & Lady Gothic joined again with guitarist (Metal Storm) and drummer (Paimon).

I can never find "Moonrise Part 2" neither to buy or download but I do my best in this compilation.

Enjoy!

LordKaos
